name: Haunted Showers
description:
Prepare for the worst showers of your life. Your Great Grand Uncle’s will notifies you that his estate will be passed on to you, that is if you’re still alive to enjoy it. Survive the trials and terrors of the five showers in his mansion, and his wealth is yours.

Should you successfully come out of each bathroom thoroughly showered and intact, escaping the perils of the ghosts, ghouls, and creatures residing on Great Grand Uncle’s property, your troubles will all be a memory, and you’ll be bathing not in water, but doubloons… hopefully.

Features

-5 fully decorated levels
-5 different body areas to clean - head, left arm, right arm, torso, and legs
-Each level contains toilets, bathrooms, and sinks, which will serve as vital roles in successfully completing the level
-Manage and balance the unfortunate events thrown your way in the state of vulnerability of showering
-Pay attention to distinct sounds and changes of the environment as to calculate your next move

Content

-Showers... Obviously.
-Melonheads
-Scalding-hot water. Ouch! Who flushed the toilet?
-Totally not off-brand soap
-A handsome melon-masquerader wearing a red speedo
